Title: Root out the Hu Feng counter-revolutionary clique exhibition cartoons 11
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Most of the cartoons of a set of 20 posters, published during the anti-Hu Feng movement, cannot be linked to any of the 17 designers mentioned on the opening sheet. This 11th one, however, has been signed by Te Wei (top left corner).Hu Feng directs his "Hu Feng Clique" like a high priest; the pennant behind him bears the text "Counter-revolution", the panel in front of him "subjective idealism". The smaller pennants read, o.a., "rumors" and "heresies".
